name: MATLAB-Sp15
tagline: CSE Training Workshops in MATLAB, Spring 2015
body:
All workshops will be held in EWS computer laboratories.  There is no sign-up for this series—walk-ins are welcome and encouraged!

# [Beginning Scientific Programming with MATLAB](#begin)

# [Introduction to MATLAB](#intro)

# [Numerical Programming with MATLAB](#num-methods)

**Spring Interpolation Data**

**Heat Equation by Finite Difference Method**

**Radioactive Decay System of Differential Equations**

# [Distributed & Parallel MATLAB](#parallel)

# [Image Processing in MATLAB](#image)

# About These Workshops
### Contributors
Neal Davis, Rishabh Narang, and Erika Fotsch developed these materials. This content is available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported License.

![CC-BY-4.0](https://i.creativecommons.org/l/by/4.0/88x31.png)

# Contact
If you have any questions about course availability, concepts, or content, please contact Neal Davis, Training Coördinator for Computational Science & Engineering, at davis68 at illinois dot edu.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
